title: The Hobo Who Couldn't Catch a Train
description: Michael has always been fascinated by the hobo lifestyle and the idea of train hopping. A near fatal car accident combined with the death of his grandmother, the loss of his job, and a vision of Al Gore puts him on the road, learning the ropes from the other hobos, jungling with oogles, running from cops, and possibly onto his first train.
author: Platinum Mike
